title.en: Estonian for Beginners II (100% Web-Based). Level A1.1 - A1.2
title.et: Eesti keel algtasemele II (100% e-õpe), tase A1.1 - A1.2

structural_unit_name.en: Department of Languages of the Baltic Region

name.en: Department of Languages of the Baltic Region

assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)

description.en:
The chapters of the course:
1. My home
2. Professions and work
3. Health
4. Clothing
5. Travelling and transport
6. Seasons and weather
description.et:
Kursuse teemad:
1. Minu kodu.
2. Elukutsed ja töö.
3. Tervis.
4. Riietus.
5. Reisimine ja transport.
6. Aastaajad ja ilm.

objectives.en: The aim of the course is to get a basic knowledge of Estonian through different topics and exercises and to get skills to participate in simple conversations.
objectives.et: Kursuse eesmärk on saada algteadmisi eesti keelest erinevate teemade ja harjutuste kaudu. Kursusel osalemine annab baasoksusesd osalemaks lihtsamates vestlustes.

learning_outcomes.en: After completing the course, the student:
- can use the basic vocabulary and grammar for the level A1.2;
learning_outcomes.et: - oskab kasutada A1.2 taseme vastavat baassõnavara ja grammatilisi vorme;

learning_outcomes.en: - is able to participate in simple daily conversations;
learning_outcomes.et: - saab hakkama lihtsamates suhtlussituatsioonides tänaval, poes, arsti kabinetis, seltskonnas ja reisides;

learning_outcomes.en: - can talk and write about her/himself, about profession and work, health, travelling and weather.
learning_outcomes.et: - oskab rääkida ja kirjutada endast, oma tervisest, elukutsest, reisimisest ja ilmast.
